meanings.sent1: The unenriched soil struggled to support healthy plant growth.
meanings.sent2: The unenriched soup lacked flavor and depth.
meanings.sent3: The unenriched wallet felt light and sad.
meanings.sent4: Her unenriched life lacked excitement and adventure.
meanings.sent5: The unenriched land was barren and desolate.

meanings.definition: Lacking in nutrients or beneficial elements.
meanings.sent1: The unenriched bread provided little nourishment.
meanings.sent2: The unenriched water was not suitable for drinking.
meanings.sent3: The unenriched salad left the diners feeling unsatisfied.
meanings.sent4: His unenriched diet left him feeling weak and tired.
meanings.sent5: The unenriched soil could not support healthy plant growth.
